## Matrix3x3.setCol() method

Set values to a column in the matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setCol(col: number, v: Vector3): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  col | number | The column index. |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The values to be set. |

**Returns:**

this

self
